title: Cartoon Fire Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Bubbles sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/OsQdMIMR4Gg


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:

● Fire 01_#[512,288].png 2048 × 1152

● Fire 02_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1152

● Fire 03_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1152

● Fire 04_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1440

● Fire 05_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1152

● Fire 06_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1152

● Fire 07_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1440

● Fire 08_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1152

● Fire 09_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1152

● Fire 10_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1440


Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
